summary:
As a dedicated and innovative professional, I am passionate about driving success through the strategic and productive application of technology and business principles. I understand that technological innovation is essential for creating and sustaining successful businesses, and have developed a multidisciplinary skillset that combines knowledge from both technology and business worlds.

Our time on this earth is limited, and I'm inspired to help creating technologies that unlock human potential and transform the way we work, live, and connect with each other. I thrive on pushing the boundaries of what's possible and seeking out new challenges and opportunities to disrupt the future.

My particular interest lies in developing and implementing novel ideas that drive successful and sustainable innovation, and I have a proven track record of success in this area. Whether working independently or as part of a team, I am committed to delivering measurable results and achieving business objectives.

school.name: Faculdade de Engenharia da Universidade do Porto

education.field_of_study: Natuur en Gezondheid & Natuur en Techniek (dubbelprofiel)

profile_positions.description:
As a Business Developer at HYGRO, I lead business growth by improving our value propositions, creating solid business cases, and developing competitive pricing strategies. I stay updated on relevant laws and regulations to effectively negotiate agreements and contracts with partners and customers.

To drive the demand for green hydrogen, I promote hydrogen fuel cell electric vehicles in the mobility sector and hydrogen gensets in the construction sector. I establish connections with key suppliers, including OEM manufacturers and hydrogen genset suppliers, to ensure a reliable supply of high-quality products, supporting industry growth and adoption.

Furthermore, I actively contribute to streamlining our internal processes and enhancing customer relationship management capabilities through the development of an ERP and CRM system. In this capacity, I have implemented an inbound sales channel and ticketing system, further improving our operational efficiency.

Moreover, I play a pivotal role in marketing and communication efforts at HYGRO. Collaborating closely with the marketing team, I leverage my expertise in business development and sales to develop effective strategies that promote our initiatives and increase brand awareness. This ensures that our projects reach the target audience and achieve maximum impact.

Last, but not least, I represent HYGRO and its mobility branche Mobihy at industry-specific events, including hydrogen and mobility-related summits. By attending these events, I seize the opportunity to showcase our company's innovations and forge valuable connections with industry professionals. Additionally, I take charge of planning and executing our participation in these events, ensuring that our presence leaves an impactful impression and aligns with our strategic goals.
profile_positions.title: Business Developer

profile_positions.description:
At the mobility branche of HYGRO, called Mobihy, I lead our Mobility as a Service (MaaS) initiative, emphasizing hydrogen vehicles and fleet management. By forging partnerships with industry suppliers, I ensure a steady supply of high-quality hydrogen products, driving the adoption of sustainable mobility solutions.

I represent Mobihy at industry events, showcasing our innovations and building valuable connections. Beyond business development, I actively engage in industry discussions, contributing to our mission of transforming mobility through hydrogen technology and efficient fleet management.
profile_positions.title: Business Developer

profile_positions.location: Alphen aan den Rijn, Zuid-Holland, Nederland
profile_positions.description:
As a private driver for high-profile individuals, I was entrusted with the crucial responsibility of providing safe, reliable, and discreet transportation services. Throughout my tenure, I approached this task with the utmost care and attention to detail, realizing the crucial importance of my role in ensuring the well-being of my clients.

This experience has allowed me to hone my skills in customer service, safety, and adaptability, and has provided me with valuable insight into the unique needs and expectations of high-profile individuals. Moreover, working with such clients has allowed me to rapidly expand my professional network, providing me with exciting new opportunities for growth and development.

Overall, my time as a private driver has been an invaluable experience, teaching me important lessons in responsibility, attention to detail, and client satisfaction. I am grateful for the opportunity to have worked in such a dynamic and challenging role, and I am confident that the skills and insights I have gained will serve me well in all of my future endeavors.
profile_positions.title: Senior Driver

profile_positions.description:
As the project leader for a prominent tech company, I spearheaded an initiative for the company to participate in an oil and gas summit. In this capacity, I conducted thorough research on recent oil finds in Suriname, enabling the company to engage with industry experts and thought leaders in a meaningful way.

In addition to my research efforts, I leveraged my extensive sales knowledge to train employees on lead generation strategies, ensuring that they were well-prepared to make the most of the company's presence at the summit. My hands-on training helped employees to identify new business opportunities, engage with potential clients, and close deals more effectively.

As part of my broader responsibilities, I also helped the company to acquire ISO certifications, streamlining our processes and ensuring that we met rigorous quality standards. Through my efforts, the company was able to improve its overall performance, enhancing our reputation as a trusted provider of high-quality technology solutions.

Overall, my experience has honed my skills in research, training, and quality management. I am confident in my ability to lead successful initiatives that drive business growth and exceed expectations.
profile_positions.title: Business Developer

profile_positions.description:
As part of my master's thesis project, I recognized the critical importance of the collaboration between formal and informal actors in the governance of urban systems. However, there was no existing framework available to assess the resilience of these actors in their interactions with each other.

To fill this gap, I undertook research to develop a resilience framework that can analyze the interactions between formal and informal actors at multiple levels. My framework allows for the assessment of the resilience of these actors in the face of various challenges and can be used to identify opportunities for improving their cooperation and effectiveness.

Through my research, I made significant contributions to the field of urban governance and provided a practical tool for policymakers, practitioners, and researchers. I am confident that my framework can help to promote more effective and resilient governance of urban systems, benefiting both formal and informal actors in the process.

Overall, my experience developing a resilience framework for urban governance has honed my research and analytical skills and has demonstrated my ability to provide innovative solutions to complex problems.
profile_positions.title: Master Thesis Project

profile_positions.description:
As a HR Support at Vitol, I played a key role in overseeing the complete digitization of the company's administrative system. My primary responsibilities included optimizing the digital transformation process, ensuring the secure transfer of sensitive data, and providing administrative support to the HR team.

Through my leadership, the project was executed successfully and on-time, resulting in a streamlined and efficient administrative system that reduced errors and improved productivity. My expertise in data security was also instrumental in ensuring that sensitive information was transferred securely and in compliance with relevant regulations.
profile_positions.title: HR Support

profile_positions.description:
As an independent contractor, I specialized in setting up sales projects and recruiting agents and prospects for various clients, including leading companies such as Essent, KPN, and Google (SEO). Over time, my expertise and efforts led to the establishment of a successful call center with 21 skilled call agents.

In this role, I managed the entire sales project lifecycle, from initial planning to successful execution, ensuring all deliverables were met on time and within budget. Additionally, I was responsible for recruiting and training call agents to meet the specific needs of each client and project.

Overall, my experience as an independent contractor has honed my skills in sales project management, team building, and training. I am confident in my ability to deliver successful results to any organization seeking to increase their sales performance.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
As a freelance telemarketer at Improvers in Amsterdam, I specialized in selling energy contracts to both small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) as well as larger companies (B2B). I effectively engaged potential customers, highlighting the advantages of our energy contracts and consistently surpassing sales targets. By meticulously managing my sales pipeline, I nurtured strong client relationships, ensuring customer satisfaction.

Moreover, my experience as a freelance telemarketer allowed me to establish a vast network within the sales industry. Through collaboration with talented sales professionals, I gained valuable insights and further honed my skills in persuasive communication and relationship building.

I take pride in my ability to successfully close sales, deliver exceptional service, and foster enduring business connections.
profile_positions.title: Partner

profile_positions.description:
As a Sales Representative for VOIP solutions, I successfully established relationships with small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) across the Netherlands. With my excellent communication skills and in-depth knowledge of the product, I was able to effectively sell VOIP solutions to meet their specific needs.

Due to my exceptional sales performance, I was quickly promoted to a Retention Specialist role, where I proactively engaged customers and addressed their concerns with the goal of exceeding their expectations. My dedication to providing excellent customer service helped me to retain a high percentage of customers, resulting in increased revenue for the company.

To further improve my skills, I regularly attended training sessions and workshops on effective sales techniques and customer retention strategies. As a result, I was able to consistently exceed my sales targets and receive recognition from my superiors for my outstanding performance.

Overall, my experience in sales and my commitment to providing exceptional customer service make me a valuable asset to any sales team.
profile_positions.title: Retention Specialist

profile_positions.description:
As a Sales and Service Agent, I was responsible for providing top-quality customer service and driving sales for the company. This involved managing customer inquiries, resolving customer complaints, and ensuring customer satisfaction at all times. In addition, I actively sought out sales opportunities and upsell potential products or services to customers.

I consistently exceeded my sales targets and received positive feedback from customers for my excellent communication and problem-solving skills. Furthermore, I played a key role in training new employees on the company's products and services, ensuring they had the necessary knowledge and skills to deliver top-quality customer service.

Overall, my experience as a Sales and Service Agent allowed me to develop a strong customer-centric approach, which has proved invaluable in my subsequent roles within the industry.
profile_positions.title: Sales And Service Agent
